bibl.title: Report from Walter Reed to the Adjutant General, December 31, 1900

div1.p: Reed details his duties for the month of December 1900. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Report from Walter Reed to the Adjutant General, December 31, 1900
div1.opener:
Columbia Barracks, Cuba.
December 31" 1900
To the
Adjutant General, U.S. Army.
Washington D.C.
Sir:
div1.p:
I have the honor to report myself on duty at Columbia Barracks,
Cuba, during the month of December 1900 as president of the board of
medical officers investigating the infectious diseases prevalent on the
Island of Cuba per. S.O. 122, par. 34, A.G.O. May 24" 1900.
div1.closer:
Very respectfully,
Your obedient servant. Walter Reed, Major and Surgeon, U.S. Army.
